titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

bill.summary: 10/15/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for three named vessels.
